original_text: Babylon attacked other nations of the world, like a hammer that breaks things into pieces. But now that hammer has broken into pieces. sentences.original_text: Babylon attacked other nations of the world,
like a hammer that breaks things into pieces.
But now that hammer has broken into pieces.
Now the other nations see that Babylon is a disgusting place.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 다른 민족들이 바빌론이 혐오스러운 곳임을 본다.
